Making AI Infrastructure Decisions Confident & Grounded

Lattice Lab helps research engineers, platform leads, and CTOs navigate the complex AI landscape with research-backed recommendations and full citations.

Product Vision

AI infrastructure decisions are complex and time-consuming. Teams spend weeks manually gathering pricing pages, model cards, benchmarks, and documentation—only to have information go stale within months.

Lattice changes this. It's an agentic AI lab assistant that automates research synthesis, processing vendor documentation, benchmarks, and pricing data to provide grounded recommendations with full citations back to authoritative sources.

Our Core Belief

Every AI infrastructure decision should be confident, grounded, and traceable. Upload your requirements, point to vendor docs, and let AI agents analyze options—with every recommendation backed by citations you can verify.

Who We Serve

Lattice is built for technical leaders making high-stakes AI infrastructure decisions.

Research Engineers

Evaluating model and infrastructure options for specific workloads. Need to stay current with rapidly evolving AI landscape.

Platform Leads

Making stack decisions for their organizations. Balancing cost, performance, and reliability tradeoffs across teams.

Agentic-Systems Architects

Designing complex AI workflows with multiple model and framework considerations. Building production-ready agent systems.

CTOs & Heads of AI

Needing decision artifacts for internal stakeholder buy-in. Making defensible infrastructure decisions with clear justification.
